name: One Hour French Bread
ingredients: 2 ½ cups hot water 3 Tbs oil
steps: Gradually add 6 cups flour. Knead until thoroughly mixed. Grease jelly roll pan. Sprinkle with corn meal. Form
two long loaves. With a sharp knife cut 3 silts on top of each loaf. Brush with beaten egg, sprinkle with sesame
Place bread in oven, bake for 15 minutes. Increase oven temp to 375°, bake bread for 25 minutes.
